services.title: Manpower & Staffing Solutions
services.description: End-to-end recruitment solutions including permanent, temporary, contract-to-hire, and project-based staffing.

services.title: Corporate Trainings
services.description: Customized training programs for organizations to upskill employees in technology, leadership, and domain-specific areas.

services.title: Campus Recruitment Training (CRT)
services.description: Specialized programs designed to prepare students for placement drives with aptitude, communication, and technical skills.

services.title: Internships & Certification Programs
services.description: Industry-relevant internships and globally recognized certifications to boost career opportunities.

services.title: Data Science & Analytics Services
services.description: Data-driven solutions including predictive analytics, AI/ML consulting, and business intelligence insights.

services.title: HR Operations & Payroll Management
services.description: Comprehensive HR support services including payroll processing, compliance, and workforce management.

services.title: Business Development & Consulting (BDE Services)
services.description: Strategic consulting and business development solutions to drive growth and expand market presence.

services.title: CA & Financial Services
services.description: Expert chartered accountancy and financial advisory services covering audits, taxation, and compliance.

services.title: In-House Projects & Consulting
services.description: Hands-on project development and consulting services to deliver practical business and technical solutions.

services.title: Soft Skills & Online Training
services.description: Professional development programs focusing on communication, leadership, and online training modules.
